Name: Hi Life Spritz
Ingredients: 30 ml Hayman's London Dry Gin from freezer
60 ml Thomas Henry Soda Water chilled
Instructions: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda and briefly stir.
Review: Borrowing its name from both BA High Life magazine and the highball glass it is served in, this refreshing long drink combines the botanical complexity of gin with honeyed elderflower liqueur balanced by white wine acidity.
History: Created 30th May 2014 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room in London, England for British Airways' BA High Life magazine. Spritz history
Nutrition: One serving of Hi Life Spritz contains 139 calories
Garnish: Lime wedge squeezed and dropped in drink
